img_above_text:
# Jade Fang
Jade Fang is one of the unique materials in Black Myth: Wukong. It is used for weapon and armor crafting to craft unique gear unlocked upon defeating a boss.
The Jade Fang can be used to craft the Twin Serpents Staff from the Shrine.

img_summary: The image shows the inventory screen from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," highlighting an item called "Jade Fang." This uncommon special crafting material is described as a fang from the Whiteclad Noble, used for crafting weapons and armor. The Jade Fang is specifically noted for its role in creating the Twin Serpents Staff from the Shrine, as mentioned in the preceding text.
